title: FEATURE JOBS: The M Agency, Axis Social, Nelson O’Neill, Sony Music Entertainment + More
text:
Innovative media, content and creative agency M Agency is on the hunt for an Entertainment & Arts Marketing Coordinator (MELB). The Marketing Coordinator role is to support client-related marketing activity, the acquisition and retention of agency-related business and provides support to the Head of Marketing in addition to client requests relating to the role. Keen to get in with one of the best agencies in the biz? Apply here.

Growing Facebook Ads Agency, Axis Social, are looking for a performance driven Sales Consultant / Business Development Manager (NSW) with an insatiable appetite for growth. As the business is growing, they need someone to come on board quick smart. Sound like a good fit? Let them know here.

Do you absolutely live and breathe web development, love coding and enjoy nothing more than learning new technologies and systems? Nelson O’Neill are looking for some gun SEO Technical Specialists (MELB) to join their team. You’ll need to be comfortable working autonomously or within a team and be a master problem solver. Think you’re the right person for the job? Apply now.

Sony Music Entertainment are searching for someone who lives and breathes music and who would love to combine their passion for music with their superstar marketing experience as their Junior Marketing Manager (SYD). You must thrive in a busy and driven environment, where no two days are the same and you shouldn’t be interested in a standard 9-5 job. Want to start right now? Let them know here.

Not quite the right gig for you? Check out these roles instead:

onepointsevenfour are looking for an Optical Dispenser/Sales Associate (SYD) who is looking to pursuing a career in fashion, retail or ophthalmics to join the team. Get all the info here.

Are you an organised multi-tasker who can handle many campaigns at once? Eva want you on board as their Performance Media Manager (MELB) to drive growth though all online media channels. Apply here.

Leonard St need an enthusiastic and motivated Store Manager (MELB) to lead their team. You’ll need to have strong time management, organisational skills and strong leadership skills. Sound like you? Get around it here.

Don’t let your dream job slip you by – Love your work! Find out more about our ethical jobs & non-for-profit jobs, jobs in WA and our jobs in Sydney, Perth, Melbourne, Brisbane, Adelaide, Gold Coast and more.

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and get yourself signed up to our Daily Job Alerts.

For employers looking to Post a Job, click here.
